description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a user registration screen, utilizing Riverpod for state management, with form validation and UI components for user input.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that presents a user registration form.

classes.name: _RegisterScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the registration form's state and UI.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the RegisterScreen widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the registration screen, including form validation and interaction logic.
